string.name: permission_accelerometer_reason
string.value: Used to detect motion patterns and tremors associated with Parkinson's disease

string.name: permission_gyroscope_reason
string.value: Used to detect rotational movements and tremor patterns for freeze prediction

string.name: permission_health_reason
string.value: Used to monitor heart rate for detecting stress spikes that may precede freezing episodes

string.name: permission_internet_reason
string.value: Used to upload monitoring data to cloud for doctor analysis and medical reporting

string.name: permission_sync_reason
string.value: Used to synchronize patient health data with cloud storage for medical review

string.name: permission_background_reason
string.value: Used to continue monitoring for freeze detection even when app is in background

string.name: permission_vibrate_reason
string.value: Used to alert the user when a freezing episode is predicted

string.name: permission_reason_location
string.value: This app needs location access to record GPS coordinates when freeze events occur for emergency assistance
